data.text: If only you were here…
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text: I've had that thought so many times.
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text: But I know that you'll always be inside of me, that you'll never disappear.
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text: That's because even if I can't hear your voice, even if I can't see your body, I can still feel you. I can feel you and your precious thoughts.
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text: Even under this beautiful starry sky, I know you're…
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text:
We look forward to seeing you again. 
The next projection will begin at…
data.name: PA System

data.text:
The planetarium. I knew she loved the stars, so I came here 
to learn more so that we would have something to talk about.

I enjoyed it more than I thought I would. I figured this was a 
good time to learn more about the stars. So I went to the gift 
shop, looking for some picture books to help my study, when…
Ah…
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text:
I always come here… 
But why are you here?
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text: Did you come to look at the stars?
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text:
Admire Vega asked me a question. 
It's rare to see her try to have a conversation.

choices.text: I thought I'd learn more about the stars.
choices.processed: <size=41>I thought I'd learn more about the stars.</size>

data.text: Why…? Are you interested in the stars?
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text:
As expected, the conversation is still going! I can't 
waste this chance. I need to come up with something witty…
…What?
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text: Wh-What are you… saying…?
data.name: Admire Vega

choices.text:
Ah, no I meant… 
You know, stars! The stars!
choices.processed:
<size=37>Ah, no I meant… 
You know, stars! The stars!</size>

data.text:
In my haste, I ended up saying something weird. I hurriedly 
corrected myself, stating that "it's because you love the stars."
Ah… I get it now. Next time think before you speak.
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text:
But, just because I love the stars doesn't 
mean that you have to as well, you know?
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text:
I get it. Since you're my trainer, 
you're trying to meet me halfway, right?
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text: But I don't want that… nor do I need it.
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text:
I've said this many times before, but I'm fine being alone. I 
don't need friends, I don't need someone to console me, and I 
don't need people to be nice to me.
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text:
Racing and winning are my burdens to bear, 
no one else's. Moreover, she… my sister…
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text: Died in my place.
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text: So just stop…
data.name: Admire Vega

choices.text:
I simply and selfishly 
want to get closer to you.
choices.processed:
<size=34>I simply and selfishly 
want to get closer to you.</size>

data.text: Again… with that?
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text:
No matter what I say, you 
continue to reply with the same thing.
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text: I'm going home…
data.name: Admire Vega

choices.text: Ah, but I figured we could…

data.text: You were looking for a book to buy, right?
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text: The one on your right is easy to understand.
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text:
Admire Vega said this after noticing the books in my hand. 
She then quietly walked away without another word.
Why can't I treat her coldly…?
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text: I could have been more aggressive… I could have yelled at her to make sure she stayed away.
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text: But to participate in races, I need a trainer.
data.name: Admire Vega

data.text: That's the only thing I need. I know that for a fact. After all, I'm happy being alone.
data.name: Admire Vega

title: As If Swimming Through A Nebula
